title: Bulkley Canyon
whats_it_like: The Smithers classic run. Big water canyons with 'boogie water' and plenty of catch on the fly waves in between
scouting_portaging: One Man Crowd and Featherbed rapids can be scouted from river right. Neither portagable at normal water level. Featherbed can be scouted / portaged form river left at low water.
when_to_go: Runnable all season once the ice is off. Typically run after freshet recedes (~ mid-late June) until ~ August.
